Somebody please seed!  Thank you.

Don't worry to get the extended version, just 10min extra and the picture quality seems to suck.

http://www.dvdbeaver.com/film/DVDCompare2/hero.htm

The short story - the extended version is a bit of a rip-off:

    - Non-subtitled opening and closing screens.
    - It is only 10 minutes longer, and not 20 min. as reported on some websites.
    - A watermark "FACE" pops up 30 seconds every 5 minutes in the upper left corner. The watermark is part of the subtitle coding, so they disappear if you choose no subtitles.
    - Colors are untrue (very uneven) - sometimes more vibrant, mostly washed out.
    - Contrast is weak.
    - Slight cropping on top edge
    - Uneven brightness boosting.
    - Haziest of the three versions.

Just check the screenshots between the versions... :(
